feed.title: Invoicerr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoicerr: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: use second color for the table note color by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/42
  • ✨ feat: update template syntax for conditional rendering of notes by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/43
  • ✨ feat: add country field to company and client details in invoice and quote templates by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/44
  • feat: the date label is not customizable by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/45
  • feat: implement custom quote invoice number pattern by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/46
  • feat: select the starting quote invoice number by @Impre-visible in https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Impre-visible/invoicerr/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for Invoicerr: v1.0.6
